mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.master_id AS "masterId", a.order_type AS "orderType", a.order_number AS "orderNumber", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.station_id AS "stationId", a.major_sort AS "majorSort",
a.longitude AS "longitude", a.latitude AS "latitude", a.suggest_finish_time AS "suggestFinishTime", a.service_hour AS "serviceHour", a.service_status AS "serviceStatus",
a.pay_price AS "payPrice", a.order_address_id AS "orderAddressId", a.order_time AS "orderTime", a.service_time AS "serviceTime", a.finish_time AS "finishTime", a.order_status AS "orderStatus", a.order_source AS "orderSource", a.pay_status AS "payStatus", a.customer_id AS "customerId", a.customer_remark AS "customerRemark", a.customer_remark_pic AS "customerRemarkPic", a.business_name AS "businessName", a.business_phone AS "businessPhone", a.business_remark AS "businessRemark", a.business_remark_pic AS "businessRemarkPic", a.shop_name AS "shopName", a.shop_phone AS "shopPhone", a.shop_addr AS "shopAddr", a.shop_remark AS "shopRemark", a.shop_remark_pic AS "shopRemarkPic", a.order_remark AS "orderRemark", a.order_remark_pic AS "orderRemarkPic", a.order_content AS "orderContent", a.cancel_reason AS "cancelReason", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO order_info( id, master_id, order_type, order_number, org_id, station_id, major_sort,
longitude, latitude, suggest_finish_time, service_hour, service_status,
pay_price, order_address_id, order_time, service_time, finish_time, order_status, order_source, pay_status, customer_id, customer_remark, customer_remark_pic, business_name, business_phone, business_remark, business_remark_pic, shop_name, shop_phone, shop_addr, shop_remark, shop_remark_pic, order_remark, order_remark_pic, order_content, cancel_reason, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{masterId}, #{orderType}, #{orderNumber}, #{orgId}, #{stationId}, #{majorSort},
#{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{suggestFinishTime}, #{serviceHour}, #{serviceStatus},
#{payPrice}, #{orderAddressId}, #{orderTime}, #{serviceTime}, #{finishTime}, #{orderStatus}, #{orderSource}, #{payStatus}, #{customerId}, #{customerRemark}, #{customerRemarkPic}, #{businessName}, #{businessPhone}, #{businessRemark}, #{businessRemarkPic}, #{shopName}, #{shopPhone}, #{shopAddr}, #{shopRemark}, #{shopRemarkPic}, #{orderRemark}, #{orderRemarkPic}, #{orderContent}, #{cancelReason}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE order_info SET
order_remark = #{orderRemark},
order_remark_pic = #{orderRemarkPic},
service_status= #{serviceStatus},
update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS id, a.tech_id AS techId, b.name AS techName, b.head_pic AS headPic, b.sex AS techSex, b.phone AS techPhone FROM order_dispatch a LEFT JOIN tech_info b ON a.tech_id = b.id WHERE a.order_id = #{id} AND a.status = 'yes' AND a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
SELECT b.picture AS "pictures" FROM order_goods a LEFT JOIN ser_item_info b ON a.item_id=b.id WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId} AND a.del_flag = '0'

SELECT a.item_id AS "itemId", b.name AS "itemName", a.id AS "goodsId", a.name AS "goodsName", a.price AS "payPrice", a.type AS "goodsType", a.min_purchase AS "minPurchase" FROM ser_item_info_goods a LEFT JOIN ser_item_info b ON a.item_id = b.id AND b.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} WHERE a.item_id = #{itemId} AND a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
select skill_id from ser_skill_sort WHERE sort_id = #{sortId} and del_flag='0'
